node.title: Patty Mills stars in Brooklyn Nets' overtime win against Toronto Raptors
node.alt: A Brooklyn Nets NBA player puts his hands to his chest during a game.
node.description: Called up to start in a depleted Nets line-up, Mills scores a season-high 30 points in a thrilling 131-129 victory over the Raptors in New York.
node.content: ["Australian great Patty Mills has stepped up with a season-high 30 points,\u00a0as his under-strength Brooklyn Nets downed the Toronto Raptors 131-129 in an NBA overtime thriller in New York.", "Mills was named in the starting five for the Nets, who were without seven players \u2014\u00a0including\u00a0James Harden, LaMarcus Aldridge and DeAndre' Bembry \u2014 because of COVID-19 protocols.", "His points tally was just four short of his NBA career high.", "The Boomers captain finished with seven three-pointers after playing\u00a043 minutes for the Eastern Conference leaders, who improved their season record to 20-8.", "Mills's off-balance three-pointer with 13.1 seconds left in the game forced overtime.", "The Raptors were down by just 130-129 in overtime when Mills split two free throws with less than four seconds remaining.", "When Scottie Barnes's three-point attempt for the Raptors\u00a0bounced away off the top of the rim at the buzzer, the game was over.", "Kevin Durant \u2014 a late addition to the Nets' line-up \u2014 produced the 14th triple-double of his career.", "He scored\u00a034 points, and pulled\u00a0down 13 rebounds and dished\u00a0out 11 assists.", "Meanwhile, Nets coach Steve Nash said\u00a0the club's issues with players under COVID-19\u00a0protocols would take some time to be resolved.", "\"They're predominantly asymptomatic, but there will be a period of time required for them to test negative [before we can]\u00a0have our full group available again,\" he said.", "\"We're not naive enough to not have concerns about more people contracting the virus, but that's out of our hands.", "\"Overall, we can't do a lot right now except wait for results to come in and control what's in our hands.\"", "The Nets have been playing short-handed all season after Kyrie Irving refused to get vaccinated, which ruled him out for home games because of a New York City vaccine mandate.", "The team decided not to let him play solely in away games.", "AP"]
